reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be a perfect summer piece with a soft cotton/polyester blend that's comfortable and not itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Essential Brands Never Disappoint
items.body: Amazon Essential cardigan are lightweight, well made and a good value. The fit is nice. The shoulder seams line up which is a nice tailoring feature. The fabric is lightweight so it can be worn in the spring or summer evenings. I purchased the darker green and it didn't disappoint. It was a lovely shade of Forrest Green. The fabric has a nice softness about it so it feels good on your arms. The length hits at mid hip so it doesn't fall below your rear like some longer sweaters do. The style is nice with a deep V in the front. Overall satisfaction with this brand. I've purchased multiple items and all have a good value and quality. Read more
items.author: Alecs

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice!
items.body: Love It! This cardigan is soft and comfy. It has plenty of stretch so it's easy to move in. It fits true to size. I got my normal size 3X, and it fits great. I like that it is not to thick and not to thin. The Burgandy color is pretty and would be great for the Fall weather. It is nice quality and great value. My only con is after wearing it I had fuzz from the cardigan all over my tank top I was wearing under it. Overall Nice cardigan. I defiantly will buy again in other colors. Read more
items.author: TG

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, tts
items.body: Ordered the black in XL. Have larger bust 38H and a size14-16 >H 5'3 Cardigan buttons up without pulling around chest area. Soft material. Not super long length, which I knew and wanted it not to be too long. Bottom of sweater hits around top of hip area , does not cover bum (length shown on model in ad is correct) Lightweight and soft cardigan, great for summer and spring. Arm length is good. V-neck is slightly deep (same as ad) if wearing buttoned up sweater, probably need a sports bra of cami/sleeveless tank underneath that peeks out unless ok with showing a lil bit of top of cleavage. Size fit just right tts. If I wanted to wear a heavier shirt or bulky blouse under cardigan, you should choose size up. Looks good unbuttoned . After wearing, I ordered 2 more in different colors. The "bright blue" is not bright or as shown in ad, it's more of a navy/federal blue bummr, had to Return. The 2nd color is "red". It's a nice shade of red, not super loud or dull, kept this one . For $13 sale price, it's a GREAT DEAL! Read more
items.author: RoMo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful sweaters!
items.body: These sweaters are beautiful. I got the light pink and the sage green. The light pink is a little darker than it shows online—really a soft, pretty pink. It’s a little sheer, but with a cami under it it’s perfect. The sage green is gorgeous, not sheer, and is my surprise favorite! They’re both soft and comfortable, not boxy, and drape really nicely. I love how light weight they are—I just wore the green one to an evening outdoor wedding reception and it was just right even during the summer. I usually wear a small, but ended up needing a medium in these. Other than the size being a little off, I love them and might end up getting more colors! Read more
items.author: FlowerMom3

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Med weight, good fit, good quality
items.body: Great price, good quality. I ordered two different sizes & necklines. Chose the crew. I machine washed in cold water regular cycle, low heat in dryer. Keep in mind, everytime you order this it could be from a different supplier, different sizing, different fabric content & so on. Read the details. Read more
items.author: Croz

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater but brown is not a true brown
items.body: Great sweater. I have two others in different colors. Fits well and is a nice lightweight sweater for the office. The one I recently purchased was supposed to be brown. I was expecting a deeper brown. This appears to have mauve undertones, so doesn’t really work for any of my outfits. I will donate it. Read more
items.author: Thomas R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful blue color, these are great sweaters, true to size.
items.body: This is the third Amazon Essentials lightweight cardi I've ordered; the others are crew-neck. The fabric has a beautiful drape to it, not tissue-weight; they're more substantial than that like regular sweater material but just a lighter weight. I usually wear an XL (5'5" size 16 ), but ordered an XXL so it would be loose-fitting, and I love the deep v-neck. It's perfect for how I want it to feel. It's a beautiful blue, a close match to the photo, perhaps not quite as bright, so I like it better. And now I'm off to order another one in a different color, because they're perfect for cool summer evenings and will transition to fall weather too. Read more
items.author: Professor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars t’s lightweight, a good price, flattering, and functional
items.body: I really like this cardigan! It’s lightweight and flattering. The arms aren’t too short either, which sometimes happens with cardigans. I usually wear a small, and this fits true to size. I’ll probably wash it on a gentle cycle and lay it flat to dry to help it keep its shape. It can be dressed up or down and looks great with skirts, pants, or dresses. Definitely a versatile wardrobe staple! Read more
items.author: glcam319

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dark Chestnut Brown Heather, Rust, Camel Heather, Light Grey Heather, Blue, Burgundy, Black, Sage Green Heather, Dark Yellow, Dark Green, Olive, Red, Bright Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
